name: Symphony PR & Marketing
tag_list: pr, public-relations, marketing, startups, tech-pr, pr-consultant
overview:
Symphony PR & Marketing, Inc. is a marketing and PR consultancy focused primarily on the technology and digital media industries. We work with both established brands and startup companies who prefer to outsource their entire marketing and public relations departments to seniorâ€“level strategists who can also â€œdo the work.â€

Specifically, Symphony provides clients with:

*Deep experience with top consumer technology and digital media companies in addition to major consumer brands

*Experienced insight focused through an integrated, holistic approach to marketing and public relations

*Entrepreneurial, strategic thinking and creative problem solving with a focus on measurable results

*Proven track record of success in client service, project management and new business development

Symphony takes a fully-integrated approach to marketing and public relations, which generates more meaningful connections with target audiences and stronger results that drive revenues for clients. We don’t believe that a stack of press clips is the end goal for PR. We push further to make PR more accountable to your bottom line and strive to create a strong thought leadership position for the companies we work with.
